TopicTitle: KSP crashing mid flight, no mods, normal temps, have to force restart pc, no logs

Articles.Content:
Ryzen 7 2700x

Asus Arez Vega 64 - Radeon Software 20.12.1

GSkill TridentZ RGB 32GB 3200mhz

Gigabyte Aurous Gaming 7 WiFi X470

Corsair AX1200i

Cooler Master 240mm Cooler

Cooler Master MasterBox TD500 Mesh

Windows 10 Pro

KSP 1.10.1.2939 Windows Player x64

 

I've previously with a nearly identical build (with no issues), save for an upgrade from 16GB to 32GB of RAM, and a new case with vertical GPU mount. Vertical GPU mount improved both GPU and M.2 temps in my setup, GPU temps arent the issue, CPU max temp is 58*C. 

The crashes have only happened while I'm in flight. I've had a total of 4. I tried reinstalling with no luck. The crashes have left no logs.
Crashes like that are often hardware problems.  I suggest you run some memory diagnostics on it

Just to clarify, does it crash or does it hang?

And your various drivers are up to date?
